review: Doctor was having very good knowledge about the problem and gave good treatment for my spouse and crown fixing done at very reasonable cost with good quality.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: All I could say is whenever I come here,l never felt like a patient.Special thanks to the entire team who makes me feel at home.As far as treatment is concerned Dr Deepak sir is very professional. Takes time to explain things and resolve problems.A pleasant experience always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a wonderful experience here as always. Few years back I got my dental treatment done during 5th month of my pregnancy and I was very comfortable .There were no complications. Now I have got my son's treatment also done .The Doctor's work is very nice. Very trusting.

Thanks to practo for suggesting a best place for dental care in chennai.I had visited the clinic for implants.After a long time I found someone so committed and ethical in this profession who really wants to make his patients  happy and satisfied. Thank you doctor for relieving me from a 2 year old pain.

He is a thorough professional and gives you very helpful advice * **** ********* *** **** ********* ******** *** ***.He never rushes you and will take the time to fully explain a procedure if one is curious as I was.He doesn't do all the procedures himself but certainly carries out all the more complex ones.He manages a great team who are all very well trained and experienced.

Dr Deepak  is one of the best dental doctor...I had earlier visited 2 dentist but they were unable to diagnose root cause...the tooth extraction and root canal treatment was done without any discomfort....Also doctors are very friendly and you feel at home..

The LADY doctor is very patient enough to treat me. She is very kind enough to explain things and very supportive during treatment. The explanation given by her is very soft and understandable. 
If she was a general physician, i would have gone to her for all generic problems also.

review: Over the last two weeks, I had five appointments at Pooja Dental Center. I had a thorough dental examination and cleaning, several old cavities replaced,two new crowns were made.  He took time to explain every procedure and gave options.I thought I would also need a root canal but doctor told me  that was not necessary.Dr.Deepak could have easily gone ahead with the root canal, but he avoided it for the betterment of the patient.

tags: Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: I have done a lot of treatment from Dr DEEPAK. But mainly I m happy because he did dental implants and gave fixed teeth to my father who is a medically compromised patient and had no teeth.My father could finally eat his meals comfortably and smile after so many years because of the sincere efforts made by the doctor and his team.My whole family is very thankful to him.

This Doctor is very much genuine. He takes enough time to diagnose the patient's problem and provide a good consultation. He owns a small dedicated team. Good work! I definitely recommend this doctor.
I am really happy. Because doctors given lot of advice and dreatment also good. Prices also very reasonable cost. Doctor given the treatment is very cheap compared to other clinics.
Excellent very friendly doctor good and patient in treating a person.one of the specialist in implant and rct know is job thoroughly well.

Very good. He is a true professional and does a fantastic job. It was just the second session with him for the root canal treatment and I have a feeling is doing a thorough job. His team too is wonderful.
It was wonderful service.well experienced doctor and he gave lot of confidence... And am happy with the implants which he placed and comfortable with it...

great clinic satisfied every treatment plan and protocol explained properly good team no complaints very much satisfied
I was suffering from dental issues and same has been rectified by Doctor Mr. Balaji. Surgery and medicine issued and I am completely alright

**** ********* *** we'll know doctor as family doctor
